div.div:
Backup data and configuration files
with "samba-tool".

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 230px; margin-left: 382px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Backup configuration files by just
copying them. Data that does not be
backuped will restored from new
primary AD by syncing data.

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
